cu.explanation_en: Setting local_s_address to an invalid IP address will cause network configuration errors and connection failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting local_s_address to an invalid IP address will cause network configuration errors and connection failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 local_s_address 設定為無效的 IP 地址會導致網路配置錯誤和連接失敗。
